short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview what your LinkedIn posts will look like in the feed. Make your audience click the “…see more” button every time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
inCreator is a tool built for Creators on LinkedIn. By installing the free extension you will be able to:

👉 Preview your LinkedIn post
👉 Know upfront where the "...see more" button will break the fold
👉 Optimize and style your post copy
👉 Draft posts and ideas, jot down hook lines or save copy from anywhere else for inspiration using our drafts database

All without leaving your browser. Which will lead to:

✅ More of your 2nd and 3rd degree network seeing your post
✅ More impressions
✅ Consequently more followers and more impact to your brand

Being a LinkedIn Creator just became a lot easier - with inCreator.

Check us out at in-creator.com

We are in no way affiliated with LinkedIn.
